title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding. Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When adding a localization key with a blank value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key blank but provide a valid value. 3. Save the file and add the localization key to the chart. 4. Verify that the externalized text is displayed correctly in the chart title.
